description.lang: The apparatus can remotely power to the load connected to the device on / off and can be used to measure the power of the load connected to the device.Also inform you your electricity usage kindly by remote is a smart plugs.

name.lang: Standby Power setting and function enable/disable

description.lang: Total 4 byte : 3 byte + 1 byte - 3 Byte : Standby Power Setting ( 0x000000 (0.00 Watt) ~ 0x493E0 (3000.00 Watt) ) - 1 Byte : Standby Power Function Enable/Disable ( 0x00 or 0x01) Default - 3 byte : 0.00W( 0x000000) / 1byte : 0 (0x00) For example, if Standby Power Function is u0022Enableu0022 and the usage of Electricity is over the Standby Power Setting value, Smart Plug cut off the power Supply.
Start or Stop for the periodically measured value transmission of the Power usage Default : 1 (0x01) - Function Enable Value - 0 (0x00) : Disable - 1 (0x01) : Enable

name.lang: Start / Stop Power accumulation Usage Calculation

description.lang: Start / Stop Power accumulation Usage Calculation Default : 1 (0x01) - Function Enable Value - 0 (0x00) : Disable(Stop) - 1 (0x01) : Enable(Start) Enable / Disable

name.lang: Report when the connected Device is being used or not.

description.lang: Report when the connected Device is being used or not. (User can know the Device's using status) Default : 1 (0x00) - Function Disable Value - 0 (0x00) : Disable(Stop) - 1 (0x01) : Enable(Start)if not set up the standby power, it does not function.

name.lang: This sets the periodic measurement value transmission rate.

description.lang: This sets the periodic measurement value transmission rate. The rate set is in increments of 10 minutes. For example, if setting value = 2, Transmission Time interval = 2 * 10 = 20 minutes. Default : 6 ( 60min )Value- 1(0x01) : 10 min ~ 144 (0x90) : 1440 min
